QuestionText: An ID card must be provided by the client for all card transactions over __________
TRUE / FALSE:There is a different refund policy for POS transactions based on the use.
In what order do you accept payment to complete a transaction
How do you attach a client to a pending reciept (Select all that apply)?
Answer1: Within the POS module, click "Customer Search", enter related identifying information, select the customer name from the list of results
Answer2: Navigate to "Customers", search for the customer name, open the POS module and resume reciept
Answer3: Keep the current customer as "Drop-In Customer" for those who may not have an account or that are purchasing a snack bar item
